# .github/pull_request_template.md
```markdown
## Description
Clear description of changes.

## Type
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation

## Testing
- [ ] Unit tests added
- [ ] Integration tests added
- [ ] Manual testing done

## Documentation
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Examples added
- [ ] Changelog updated

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows style guide
- [ ] Tests pass
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] Changelog updated
```
